alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 11:25PM CDT until June 08 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR LINCOLN...NORTHERN ELLSWORTH...RUSSELL AND NORTHERN SALINE COUNTIES... At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Barnard to 5 miles northeast of Lucas to 6 miles northeast of Natoma, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russell, Wilson, Lincoln, Lucas, Gorham, Sylvan Grove, Luray, Dorrance, Beverly, New Cambria, Barnard, Milberger, Glendale, Bunker Hill, Paradise, Waldo, Ash Grove, Westfall, Russell Airport and Wilson State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
